website_summaries.verdict: Swaddles dogs in a snug-fitting vest to help them stay calm during storms, fireworks, or other anxiety-inducing events.
pros: Comfortable to wear, and dog has freedom of movement
Straps can be adjusted for a custom fit
cons: Some dogs don't respond well to wearing it

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Sweater!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great choice for our big move! We had a 8 hour car ride with my senior dog who does not enjoy long rides. She was in between two sizes so we sized up and it is clearly big on her, but still worked like a charm. I was able to put her harness on the top. She actually gets excited when I put it on. She slept most of the car ride - awesome! ----- [...] :)
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: I don't think it works :/
customer_reviews.text: I have a rescue dog that I purchased this for hoping to mitigate some of his anxiety. Unfortunately, it doesn't seem to help. I've tried walking him in it and he still gets scared of the usual noises, and I put it on him during a thunderstorm tonight and I found him trying to hide in my shoe rack. I think this shirt may work for some, but unfortunately didn't work for my little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: My mini Aussie would have horrible anxiety anytime I left the house. She has tore up all of my blinds and whatever else she could get her paws on. I tried putting her in the crate when I left home. She would howl and bark non stop. It was creating problems with the neighbor. So I said what the heck and tried this as a last resort. Luna has only worn the shirt for a day but I've noticed a change in her behavior. She has been more relaxed. Only time will tell if it will keep her completely calm but I'm impressed so far
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Much Calmer and Happy Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the Thundershirts. First of all, I didn't think my dogs would allow me to put them on them. They did not give me any trouble at all. The first time we had a thunderstorm, I put them on them, the shaking almost ceased. They look for their thundershirts when they're scared now. I'm so thankful for them.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: She is a rescue with many issues and this jacket only made things worse so national willnot be trying it again on her
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for my dog. She is a rescue with many issues and this jacket only made things worse so national willnot be trying it again on her. I would like to know why there is a shipping fee to return it? I do have Amazon prime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: No noticeable affect on my golden retriever in regards to lowering anxiety during thunderstorms. Certainly could be effective on other dogs but for me it was nothing more than a dog shirt with lots of velcro. If you like dressing your dog (not me) then at least you have a stretchy dog shirt. Otherwise think twice on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE BARLOW

customer_reviews.title: Works well for both my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This Thundershirt is upgraded with a patch for aromatherapy and reflective piping along the side. I bought this one for my second dog. The original worked really good for my first dog who is a nervous traveler and doesn't like loud sharp noises. I also use it when there are loud storms with heavy rain, wind and especially thunder and lightning. Both dogs like wearing the Thundershirts it really does calm them down for car rides.
customer_reviews.author: CJF

customer_reviews.title: don't trust seller
customer_reviews.text: Ordered twice. The first one I measured my dog, followed their sizing chart accordingly. Product way too big for my dog. I reordered a smaller size. Waaayyy to small. First time I ordered directly from Thundershirt - not problem with the return. The second time I ordered through Rustic Hound. Their return policy pretty much guarantees that if you open the box, you will automatically be charged a restocking fee potentially up to 50%+ the shipping costs. So they will get the shirt back and your refund will be minuscule. Easier to donate to a shelter and hope it works for them.
customer_reviews.author: Sumner

customer_reviews.title: First Calm Car Ride!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to say that this jacket "cured" my dog but it defiantly helped in a car ride. My dog never lays down and just breathes heavy when ever we have to take her on a car ride (usually to see family 4 hours away). I can tell you that this jacket helped and after about 15 minutes of a car ride she was laying down and no panicking like normal. I would invest in this jacket if your dog has a hard time riding in a car.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Perrin

customer_reviews.title: My poor dog was terrified
customer_reviews.text: I tried this, hoping I would not have to give my German Shepherd tranquilizers during the 4th of July fireworks/firecrackers. The Thundershirt did not work at all. My poor dog was terrified. I refitted the Thundershirt a few times, but it still did not help. Finally went back to the tranquilizers and my dog settled down. The Thundershirt was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Renbeth

customer_reviews.title: Thundershirt did not make much of a bang!
customer_reviews.text: Tried the thundershirt. The size Large was perfect for a 43 pound Husky. I wrapped the dog before a thunder storm and it had no affect on her anxiety. The dog is afraid of lightning and thunder and behaved the same way (with and without). I have not had a chance to test with fireworks but the price to ship and return is not worth it. I would rather give all my amazonians the benefit of my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Berns

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised at how well this shirt works. ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well this shirt works. My male German Shepherd gets a lot of anxiety (not in storms or on the 4th of July, just in life). Sometimes he's so restless that he drives me crazy! He barks viciously at the slightest noise outside and is really on edge when we have people over. When I put the ThunderShirt on him, sometimes he'll just go right to sleep. It doesn't calm him down 100% in all situations, but it does help in most.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Recommended fit was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Recommended fit was perfect. Industrial strength velcro is difficult to work with.....afraid I was going to tear the slightly thin fabric of the shirt. As with previous reviews one strip of velcro started coming off after only a few times of wearing. Eventually if totally came off. It's a shame that such a good product has so little quality control. Either the fabric should be thick enough for the velcro used or the velcro should be changed to a lighter strength. Also the stitching involved needs to be addressed. If the stitching was strong enough, the velcro couldn't come off. We continue to use it for our excitable fur baby though as it seems to calm him slightly.
customer_reviews.author: deanawat

customer_reviews.title: My dog asks for it when she is scared.
customer_reviews.text: Five stars because it really helps my dog. She is a scaredy shepherd. Fireworks, loud noises, thunderstorms, and electronic chirping all turn her into a quivering, senseless mess. With this shirt on, she doesn’t try to bolt out doors or hide in weird places. She sticks close to me and stops shaking, which is a huge improvement. In fact, when she hears a scary noise she heads straight to the closet I keep it in. I only wish the Velcro were sewn on a little better because it is peeling off. I can fix it with my sewing machine but that’s not the point.
customer_reviews.author: calico girl

customer_reviews.title: Calms my terrified dog
customer_reviews.text: As my Australian shepherd grew older, her fear of thunderstorms and fireworks grew. I tried a lot of remedies, Lavender oil and other oils made to calm, but they worked just a little, but not as much as she needed. So I purchased a thunder shirt for her. This calmed her about 95%. The genuine Thundershirt has a spot near the neck where you can put things like essential oils. Once I put Lavender oil on the spot, she totally calmed down and went to sleep...in the middle of a thunderstorm. Amazing!!!! So if you are looking for the secret recipe to keep your dog calm, it is 1 part Lavender oil and one part Thundershirt...original...not a cheaper copy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Abbott

customer_reviews.title: unfortunatly not a solution for my anxious hound/shepherd mix
customer_reviews.text: A little background- My 9 month old pup is fairly anxious and has extreme separation anxiety. Due to his destructive chewing when alone we decided to crate train him where his anxiety symptoms slightly have gotten worse. Exercise,positive reinforcement, and calming treats have not quite done the trick. As a last resort before we decided to try other options we got a thunder-shirt. We put it on him and he loved it. I would almost say it helped him. However as soon as he hit the crate he tore it to shreds. So there goes $30 down the tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Pigeon

customer_reviews.title: There is hope for nervous dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I think that I have the most insecure unsocialized dog of all time. I have tried prozac and the full gamut of medications for her. My son told me about this shirt and when I put it on her, she actually sat down and stopped hyperventilating. She wore it off and on for several weeks and has come a long way. She even lets people pet her and she doesn't jump when you come in the room. It is rather embarrassing to have a rottweiller that is such a scardy cat. She is coming along well. .
customer_reviews.author: kphaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my Westie
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for my 10 year old Westie. She suffered from severe anxiety. Thunderstorms, lightening and fire crackers made her so fearful that she would vomit and seek shelter under blankets, chairs, sofas. Etc. I purchased this and she wore it but it did not work for her. I made her a homemade tent, by placing a blanket over a chair. She loved her new home and even used it when she was in pain from kidney cancer and liver failure. My Westie has went on to be with the Lord. I will forever miss her.
customer_reviews.author: sanvanalyeth

customer_reviews.title: NOT for the crazy coonhound
customer_reviews.text: Lol. I have tried everything to help our coonhound with over stimulation while outside. She barks (and it's so loud the neighbors from the other side of the pond can hear) or is making monkey noises the entire time. She has to be first, she is terrified of trucks, SUVs, people running, bikes, scooters. I have literally tried every type of device/collar and nothing has worked. Sh even snubs treats while trying to train her. However, she is the exact opposite inside the home. Totally chill and affectionate. With that said, this concept might work for some but did absolutely nothing for our coonhound. It doesn't even phase her one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to get this
customer_reviews.text: As I write this, there is a hell of a thunderstorm with hail going on. My 2 10yr old dogs who have spent way too much time, scared and shaking from thunderstorms are both sleeping next to me. They each have their little coats on and are unfazed. I bought these July 5th after the fireworks around the neighborhood were insane and the dogs were crying and could not be consoled. They have worn them about a half dozen times now, whether it's a storm, more fireworks or the beeping from the oven (they hate beeps) and they are so mellow now. Highly recommend these. Wish I had bought them years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Cass

customer_reviews.title: GREAT improvement in my dogs’ anxiety level.  Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: First thing, my criteria for a five star review, or a perfect review, is that it took my dogs’ anxiety away 100%. It did not do that for my dogs. However, it is still great. It took them from shaking and hiding, to only shaking and hiding when fireworks were going off right outside our house. When they were in the distance, both dogs were ok and would stay with us, which is a HUGE improvement. I highly recommend this for your dog. In conjunction with the thunder shirt, desensitization training, and other little things I do, I am hopeful that next year my dogs will be ok with fireworks even on our street.
customer_reviews.author: giro

customer_reviews.title: My dog is finally calm!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is THAT dog. The one that shakes if you even say her name. The one that has a mini panic attack when you get home. The one that try's to constantly lick your face. However, as soon as I put this on her the shaking stopped and she just appears to be so relaxed. Really like this product!
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: not a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 different sizes and it just doesn't quite fit my dog. He's a 17 lb terrier mix. Either the small size didn't fit around his chest or the medium covers his whole belly. This is a problem when he pees. The shirt is wet as soon as he goes outside. I kept the medium, but it spends more time in the wash than on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: brady @ fresh face skin studio

customer_reviews.title: IMMEDIATE RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my female German Shepard who has severe separation anxiety. She was separated from her brother after living together for 2 years and went from a house to an apartment with a lot of noise. She obsessively barks, paces and looks out the window when I leave. I put the jacket on and was expecting it to be a battle - it wasn't! No exaggeration, the vest hit her fur and she was a different dog. Rather than fighting she just sat down and let me adjust it. She was immediately calm and curled up to take a nap. This is remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Skippy likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Our little Lhassa-schon has always been a laid back pup. He is 14 years old now and has been a diabetic for about 3 years now. The cataracts he has gotten from the diabetes are so bad now, he is blind. We are pretty sure he is mostly deaf now too. Recently he has started pacing and panting at night and just getting lost. We put his thundershirt on with a dab of Lavender oil and he is so much better! I was afraid he would get overheated but he appears to be comfortable! Thank you! He's been such a good boy all his life, he deserves to be comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is well made, seems to have a little bit of effect on my dog, however it is not a miracle cure all for my dog. I was really hopeful this would be helpful, moved my Jack Russell from no storms to the Midwest with huge thunderstorms weekly. She gets so terrified I was looking for something to help, fingers crossed I tried the thundershirt... Little effect. She does seem to sleep a bit easier when wearing, but when the thunder rolls.. she is about the same craziness (shaking and panting). Worth a shot for your fur critter. I got an XS for my 12lb Jack, it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Plum

customer_reviews.title: It didn't really help for car sickness
customer_reviews.text: This product is a shirt like described -it basically swaddles your pet and is supposed to help calm them if they are afraid or anxious. I think if it helps an anxious and/or scared dog the price is worth it. My puppy suffers from car sickness and will drool and throw up each time I take her anywhere- even on quick trips. We tried this shirt over the weekend but I don't think it helped much. This product may help with anxiety but doesn't really help for car (motion) sickness.
customer_reviews.author: SHELLER

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it for our dog!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Our dog would shake uncontrollably when there was a storm. The video I attached was mid thunderstorm. It dont think you can hear in the storm but a big crack of thunder occurs during the video which causes him to turn his head to look outside, but little to no shaking! He obviously is still a little nervous about storms but this product helps to bring the anxiety down SO much and the difference is visibly noticeable. Also used the calming spray from them but not sure if it is necessary or not
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: It's a MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I had considered ordering for thr longest time and I regret I didn't order it sooner. Our dog is terrified of storms, he shakes and claws at us and there have been times I had to swaddle him in a blanket. This product is amazing, it isn't weighted but its basically a dog swaddler so it squeezes them (adjustable with velcro) so they aren't as anxious. I also bought it used and saved 60% and it was brand new - the box had been opened and that's it. Great quality of you're cautious about buying used.
customer_reviews.author: Brandielou

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My dog is terrified of thunderstorms and fireworks. When I put the Thundershirt on her, she’s still upset, but she’s not hiding. Usually she will go and hide in the bathroom during a thunderstorm, shaking, and panting while she’s in there. With the Thundershirt on, she’ll sit out with us, but she’s still shaking and panting. She loves putting on the Thundershirt as it makes her feel more secure. The scary part is taking the Thundershirt off because of the loudness of the Velcro coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: korny518

customer_reviews.title: Helped my dog with serious anxeity!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium shirt for my 45lb collie mix. I was worried it may be too small, as it should only fit up to 40lbs, but she is skinny. She suffers with serious anxiety! Thunder, fireworks, car rides, being alone, or when she goes in her crate. And bow that my husband is deployed its even worse. I can say that it helps her tremendously! I've read how to use them. I get her exercised before she wears it and feed her treats while she is in it so she recognises it as being a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: The Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Calmed out dog almost immediately!
customer_reviews.text: Our little 15 pound recue dog used to be terrified when it rained, stormed or even looked like bad weather. My daughter recommended that we get her a thunder shirt. We used it this past Saturday when we were expecting a horrible storm. The Thunder shirt had an almost immediate effect. She quit shaking and actually let me use a cloth to clean her face while she stood there there cool and calm. We had a terrible storm an hour later and she snoozed right through it. I highly recommend the Thunder Shirt. It's also very easy to put on. Nice quality. I wish they made these for humans!
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: We're so glad we got this product! We have a lab/pitbull mix who is deathly afraid of thunderstorms. We've tried the calming chews and a low dose of melatonin but nothing worked. Then we tried the thundershirt and it's helped quite a bit. It gives Charlie a little security. It's like giving him a big hug. Definitely worth the money. It doesn't take it all away but it really helps!! Charlie (and the whole family) thanks the makers of the thundershirt!!
customer_reviews.author: Loni Oates

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable! It works!
customer_reviews.text: I must admit, I was extremely doubtful. My 11 year old Maltese has coward behind the toilet when it storms for years. Someone at work told me about the thundershirt so I bought one just in time for last nights storms. He slept through the night and never once went behind the toilet. It is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: lgj5020

customer_reviews.title: This helped our dog so much!
customer_reviews.text: Waited a while to review this item so we could see it in action. Purchased this for our dog Hercules for 4th of July. Usually Hercules is in your lap behind the couch under the table or in his kennel while fire works go off or when there is any loud unexpected sounds. With the vest Hercules was still a little spooked but was able to stay outside with us and even played ball with the other dogs while the fireworks were happening! We also put this on him during thunder storms and he is able to sleep right through them!
customer_reviews.author: haleigh

customer_reviews.title: It works.  It Works...IT WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3yr old tiny Yorkie is very frightened of thunder...he is a nervous wreck as a storms move in closer to home...whining, pacing, running up and down our hallway, and of course when he's upset...so are we. SO....decided to give this a shot, price was a little steep, what if it doesn't even work...!!?? Buy My Oh My....when I put this little ThunderShirt Classic on him...he is a different animal!!!! He completely calms down to the point of "yawning" as it thunders outside!! He lays down in my lap....and just drifts off to sleep...AMAZING!!!!!! THANKS THUNDERSHIRT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: amazon midwest fan

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog is extremely afraid of thunder and this ThunderShirt helps to calm her. As long as I make sure to put it on her before the storm starts, she will remain calm until it passes. Before purchasing this jacket, she would shake and pant and cry during thunder. With her jacket on, she will sit next to me on the couch and not worry at all. However, i have found that once the thunder has started and she has already started getting upset; the jacket doesn't help much.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Renee Long

customer_reviews.title: Helped for general anxiety.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased size small for 12lb yorkiepoo to help with general anxiety issues. The thundershirt seems well made and fits well. Zoey has always been a nervous dog and shivers often. We didn't notice an immediate change but after using it a few times it seems to have helped. I can tell she likes the secure feeling it gives her. The only problem is that she doesn't like the sound of the velcro when taking it off. I've learned to remove it slowly. The use of velcro in the design is brilliant so I'm not really complaining. I'm hoping her thundershirt will also be helpful in car rides and visits to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A. Roe

customer_reviews.title: By-god it works!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this product for sure. It's a essentially a corset for dogs and its supposed to help them with anxiety. Really? But we bought it just at the right time (expected an oncoming storm) and by-god it works! Can't believe how this simple product can change a dogs entire behavior. He wasn't shaking or whimpering, or walking around the house aimlessly filled with anxiety. Instead acted real chill and mellow like everything was cool and nothing bothered him, not even the storm outside. It made me into a believer. So I'm glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: YJYu

customer_reviews.title: "Insanely calm" is true!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 1000 stars I would. My 4 year old Staffordshire Terrier has terrible thunderstorm anxiety. So much that he violently shakes and vomits. I was skeptical of this thunder shirt but tried it anyways. Well, the sticker on the shirt says "insanely calm" and my boy is LITERALLY INSANELY CALM!!! It's amazing. It's currently thundering putside and He is laying belly up and relaxed, hasn't shook at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Immediately comforting and very effective
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised at how well this works! My poor dog has been terrified by neighborhood fireworks every night for weeks. I felt terrible for her and could not seem to sooth her. I decided to give this a try. I am extremely impressed with the immediate comfort it provided. For the past 2 nights of fireworks, she has been relaxed and even sleeping. No more shaking, pacing or crying. I am so happy and relieved. I 100% recommend this product for a nervous pup. I know it seems a little expensive but for us, it is totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Is this magic?! You need to buy this right now!
customer_reviews.text: I have a puppy that suffers from separation anxiety, he was abused before I got him so he has major issues. I have tried everything to try to calm him down, to stop destroying things (two holes on two different leather couches, I’ve lost count on how many phone cord chargers, and too much to name here) he can’t leave my site without him having an anxiety attack and the minute I put this on him, he’s a completely different dog! He is so calmed, doesn’t follow me everywhere, doesn’t freak out if I leave the room. It definitely has helped so much!
customer_reviews.author: RMN27

customer_reviews.title: Calms our hyper pup
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 rescue dogs--2 are very afraid of thunderstorms so a neighbor suggested we try the Thunder Shirt. Measured our Maltese, followed the instructions and got an extra small. Sadly, it was too small. We do have a hyper toy poodle and thought we would try it on her. Well, it was amazing. She was able to remain calm for a long period of time. So I can truthfully say, this really works well calming our pup.
customer_reviews.author: D. ChristensenTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: This product really helped my girl. She lived in a cage or kennel her whole life and had a lot of issues when we adopted her. Thunder was terrifying and she just shook all over. Wearing this jacket didn't put her totally at ease but it stopped her from shaking. It's been over a year now and she doesn't even need it anymore. We are having a really loud thunderstorm right now and while she's not completely at ease she's laying by my side and wags when I assure her. No jacket!
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help control anxiety.
customer_reviews.text: Although the Thundershirt is well-made, it did not work as advertised. I have a 10 year old standard poodle who pants excessively on any car trip that is longer than about 15 minutes. I’ve tried vet-prescribed calming medications, motion-sickness medications, rewards, etc., all to no avail, and, based on all the positive reviews, had hoped maybe the Thundershirt might work. It only made her panting & distress worse. If it had helped, I would have given it 5 stars. Since each dog is different, perhaps this product will be a 5 star for your anxious pet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!  IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were more than skeptical when we saw advertisements for this. I checked Amazon reviews and decided to give it a try. We have a rescue dog that panics whenever there is thunder, a lawnmower running or fireworks. Last week we had a small thunder storm pass through and results were good. Today we had a storm come through with thunder rumbling. Bo was a calm as could be! Generally he would be behind me on the couch trembling. Attached is a photo of him at the height of the storm. After the first storm we bought our daughter one for her sissy pit bull. The results have been just as remarkable with her dog.
customer_reviews.author: DRae

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Satsified
customer_reviews.text: This product was very surprising for me. I bought this for my red nose Pitbull because she has separation anxiety and jumping problems and is extremely high energy. I bought the thunder shirt thinking it might make a small difference but I was very surprised that her jumping pretty much stopped all together and is much calmer. I'm very happy with this product and will be getting another one for my other Pitbull too.
customer_reviews.author: katiekw

customer_reviews.title: Major difference during storms.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has high anxiety during thunderstorms. He paces and pants and needs to be close to us. We decided to buy the ThunderShirt and it was so worth it. He is much more relaxed with the ThunderShirt and even fell asleep during this last storm. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Thunder What

It's terrible to see that act that way. I am sure it's not the same for every dog, however doesn't seem to improve the condition.
customer_reviews.author: HC4372

customer_reviews.title: Super Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I never thought that a lightweight yet stretchy material vest would keep my rumbunchus maltipoo calm during Thunder & July 4th Explosives ... But it did .. Normally I walk her & she walks barking at other dogs, bicycles, anything with wheels, & with the Thunder shirt on she sat on the porch with me kool as a cucumber..So calm ,she sat on my lap & slept without barking hysterically at other dogs or anyone... She's like a totally different dog ... I wish I would have known about this thunder shirt sooner ... I would highly recommend it to anyone who has a dog with major Anxiety..
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: This was such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog who has severe separation anxiety/anxiety in general and I thought this would help her at least a little. It did absolutely nothing, it was extremely flimsy and not what I was expecting at all. This was overall such a waste of money but I am willing to try anything to help my gal out even if it’s just a little but unfortunately in this situation it did absolutely nothing for her so it was a lose lose situation. Don’t waste your money on this product if you have a high anxiety dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it fits perfect. My lab thinks its more of a punishment ...
customer_reviews.text: This works okay with my Labrador. I chose the size large for her based on her weight, and it fits perfect. My lab thinks its more of a punishment to wear this however, since when she has it on she stands very rigid and walks around looking very uncomfortable. I will continue to try to get her to be comfortable wearing this, but she definitely calms down after wearing it for a short period of time. Our trainer says she is "different" from other labs, though. She was part of an Alaskan litter, and is incredibly stubborn.
customer_reviews.author: OCM

customer_reviews.title: Works for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: My little terrier has developed periodic anxiety. She will pant, shake and hide during loud noises (gun shots, fireworks) and, for some reason, when we are getting ready to have friends for dinner. After ensuring with her vet that she had no physiological cause, I ordered the ThunderShirt. Fits her well, and reduces her anxiety symptoms. She even willingly lets me put it on her. Now, if I could only get her to put in on herself! I understand that ThunderShirts don't work for all dogs, but it is certainly worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor Gal

customer_reviews.title: Calmer dog and calmer owner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt. I put it on my dog and she is calmer! I take it off only to wash it and put it right back on! Amazing purchase. I have purchased Thunder Shirts in the past for previous dogs and was always satisfied. This one is even better! Not being able to follow her regular routine due to Covid- 19, was making her anxious. We are both calmer due to the shirt. Thank you! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Marie Drum

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I bought on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for so many reasons. It really swaddles my Mountain Feist. (Squirrel dog) He is such a sweet and loyal companion. He doesn't like being left by himself (we are retired) so he's used to having us around. Going to the vets, he shakes all over. Very sad to see him do this despite trying hard to make him feel calm. Thunderstorms and fireworks are a big problem as well. He weighs about 27 pounds, and this fit is a medium ~ which as you can see, fits him perfectly. He's bigger chested but has a narrow hindquarter but this enveloped him in comfort and security. Glad we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Thundershirt
customer_reviews.text: Thunder Shirt - at first hint of thunder it did nothing - I took it off - dog probably could have used a size smaller. Thunder started again. I put in on again, this time more snugly (not tight) just so he could feel it. Within 5 minutes he went to his bed and went to sleep. For the first time I was able to sleep through the night when there was thunder and lightening. He was on the floor next to the bed when I woke up but usually I wake up to his breath on my face because he is panting so loudly. This is after one use. I'll update if anything changes. Nighty night !!!
customer_reviews.author: DBeck

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not as durable as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Coat does help calm the dog! Our coonhound mix rescue has major anxiety issues and it does help with that. Added an adaptil collar as well (haven't tried the spray for the patch, yet). Cons: It is not as well made as I had hoped. Velcro on the neck started coming loose after a month of wear. Now seeing small holes from wear popping up in the fabric after less than 2 months. Dog definitely benefits from it, though. I'm going to try a bigger size (so it's not stretched as much) in sport version (more aeration and different fabric) next time and see if it holds up better.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieK

customer_reviews.title: Doubles as cold weather gear and calming shirt
customer_reviews.text: My 50 lb. pit bull mix doesn't have a thunderstorm phobia, but she is VERY high energy and it's often quite difficult to get her to calm down. At the suggestion of a friend in the veterinary industry, I purchased this shirt for the winter to help keep her warm (as opposed to the little jackets for dogs), but quickly found that it has an amazing calming effect on her, so now I put it on her whenever I need her to calm down. I highly recommend it. And it's guaranteed. Hard to beat that.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: somewhat helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have a rescue dog who is afraid of nearly everything, including thunderstorms, of course. I had hoped this vest would help him. The fit was good and there seemed to be some minimal improvement in his fear level. However, after a few uses, he seemed to be afraid of the vest and would run rather than let me put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Janet/ Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have used the shirt only once for a brief time and it helped with Rudy's anxiety during the storm. It was a mild thunder storm so will have to wait for a more intense situation for the ultimate test. I think it will really work since the first time worked. He really liked being snug in his little shirt which surprised me since he has never worn clothes of any kind. I think this will solve our anxiety problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a llaso apso who is scared of thunder, hammers, car backfires, you name it! She would shake and pant and it was impossible to calm her down. I was very skeptical of this vest, thinking that it would never work. I was wrong! First time use was a big difference in my dog. It didn't totally calm her, but she wasn't panting and her shaking was at a minimum. I'm a total believer in this product now.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M

customer_reviews.title: So close
customer_reviews.text: This product is so close to being great! It has all of the qualities listed in other positive reviews as well as the product page. My only negative is that it didn't help my dog's anxiety, which is really bad. I wanted to test this out as a last resort before considering medication and wish it worked better! It is very soft, provides stretch but doesn't get too big, and is very light/easily foldable. I recommend it as something to try but be warned it isn't the best solution for some dogs; you just won't know until you try!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Works well but my dog hates wearing it
customer_reviews.text: We have a love/hate relationship with this Thundershirt in my house. My dog really hates wearing it, he runs away and acts super relieved when I remove it. BUT it works! It calms him down and helps him deal with and sleep through fireworks. Previous to the Thundershirt if my dog heard a firework while outside he would snap into fight or flight and try to run home, if he's wearing the Thundershirt he is able to continue his walk. Today is July 3rd and he is sleeping through the fireworks. So, I'm a happy customer...my dog would probably burn it if he could. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mindy J

customer_reviews.title: My sister and family can finally pet my dog
customer_reviews.text: My sister was able to pet my dog for the first time. I have had my dog for a year and she doesn’t really like people or other animals. She is a lot calmer with the shirt. I wouldn’t say it helps with her anxiety because she still seems freaked out, but she is now approachable to my family. I am hoping that she will continue to improve with this though!! Just as an FYI I did buy a small for my 12-14 lb dog and it fits her perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: This helps my lab so much!
customer_reviews.text: —Feel free to ask me any questions about my review!— This product helps my dog so much! She is a 100 pound chocolate lab who has awful anxiety when storms come. Being that she’s so big, when she’s anxious she wants to cuddle, she can get very aggressive and has toppled me over before. This coat helps so much. I have some CBD dog treats that I give her as well and she is so happy and sleeps right through the storm I hope my description was of use to you! —Follow @CassandraMercedes on Instagram for more amazing Amazon finds!—
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Mercedes Hanes

customer_reviews.title: I love it and so does Fred!
customer_reviews.text: So awesome! We will see what the long term brings. We are in the beginning of create training a almost 7 year old Jack Russell. We just got him a month ago and he has serious anxiety with shaking, scratching, crying and barking. We are his 3rd owners, the first being my late father and the second my late uncle. I put the ThunderShirt on as soon as I brought the mail in and within 5 mins Fred, the afore mentioned Jack Russel, was sound asleep with no shaking. He is enjoying this first nap in his bed and I'm looking forward to see if it helps him in his crate. Totally worth giving a try.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P Leathern

customer_reviews.title: XXS 4lbs
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered XS for my 4lb yorkie. Much too big. Returned and ordered XXS and fits him perfectly! I already had a mellow shirt for him. But he seems to have taken so much better to this shirt. He definitely has anxiety and stress. He on prozac to help reduce his stress levels. He gets very upset at any noises outside of the apartment. He seemed to mellow out more than normal right away after this was one. His normal scream barking just quiet riffs instead when he heard noises. No running back and forth freaking out over the noises. So... so far this seems to be helping my little guy.
customer_reviews.author: The PeanutTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: We loved the idea behind this product and had heard of them before so we purchased two for our dogs. Both dogs get very anxious whenever there is a thunderstorm, fireworks, or gun fire (we live in the country). First of all the sizing is a huge problem. We ordered a large for our Lab sized dog and it was too big. The same for the medium we ordered for our foxhound sized dog. The first time we tried them they did appear to help some but I fear it was because we REALLY wanted them to work, because after that they didn't seem to have any effect. We are still searching for a solution.
customer_reviews.author: C. Finney

customer_reviews.title: Good in theory, my dog HATED it.
customer_reviews.text: While some dogs may benefit from the ThunderShirt, mine absolutely hated it. It gave him more anxiety to have the shirt on and he spent his days obsessively rolling on his back trying to get it off. Unfortunately, the ThunderShirt will go in the Goodwill pile where it will hopefully help another dog.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Two dogs that love it!
customer_reviews.text: I rescued a little 5lb stray. She was scared of everything and everyone when I brought her home. She is still scared of a lot. She loves when I put this on her when we are going for a ride in the car or when anyone comes over. You should definitely follow the instructions they give about getting them used to it at the beginning. We had one of these for my Mom's dog who was afraid of storms. He loved it too and it helped him quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Danya Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Does not work, or fit.
customer_reviews.text: Have a dog with anxiety, tried this on the suggestion of my vet. Measured and ordered. But it does not fit properly. My dog has a body like a greyhound-deep chest that quickly tapers off to a slender belly. The jacket just slides down off his chest onto the soft belly unless I make the front velcro really tight and restricting (directions say not to do this). Also it did nothing for his anxiety-tried during thunderstorms, same shaking/panting and fear as always. Returned. Side note: the "create a review": "rate features" has a "flavor" rating O.o
customer_reviews.author: Dissatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: It works! She no longer trembles and pants violently when it's storming. With this thunder shirt on, she is now more relaxed and sits calmly :) I have a 12 lb shih-tzu and got her the extra small. It fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: zonkaghoop

customer_reviews.title: I was a skeptic!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This jacket is magic! I was very skeptical when I first heard about it. In fact I wouldn’t even bother to research it at first because I thought, no way would that work for my dog. He is terrified of fireworks, like extremely frightened. We’ve had more fireworks this summer, every night for a month so I thought I would give it a try. First night I had to wrestle it on him but once it was on , he calmed down. Still scared but not freaking out. After that, as soon as we hear the first pop, I get the jacket and he stands perfectly for me to put it on. It’s been a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My dog responds really well to the pressure shirts. She had outgrown ( another brand) and needed a bigger one, so I went with Thundershirt. I do love it, but the size I went with (65-100 lbs) is just slightly too big for her ( 67lbs) she’s a shepherd/beagle mix ... and has a big upper chest measurement in relation to her lower body. I’m going ahead and ordering a size down for her and donating this one to a local shelter. They are great shirts, work really well to reduce anxiety and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carolinda

customer_reviews.title: On the whole, this worked for our dog
customer_reviews.text: This shirt definitely helps our rescue dog calm down. He is 90lbs and can be destructive during storms (we have several doors and trimming that need replacing at this point) That said, it is not a perfect solution and if there are longer periods of time (e.g. daily storms), then our dog is already agitated and the shirt (while still reducing his anxiety) doesn't eliminate his anxiety. Our next step would be to medicate, but we'd rather not unless we end up in the situation where it's our house or him.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bruggeman's wife

customer_reviews.title: Don't Second-guess Yourself - Just Try It!
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided to give this a try with our awesome rescue dog who has anxiety during thunderstorms and fireworks. We received it today and, as luck would have it, have encountered both of those things since then. Our dog has gone from panting, trembling, and manically seeking a hiding spot before Thundershirt to calmly sitting or lying down with no shaking at all. I can tell he still doesn't like thunder and fireworks, as he's still alert, but he's much calmer and even confident enough to walk around a but wagging his tail. My only regret is that I didn't buy this product sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Minnow525

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size for borderline weight.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Thunder Shirt. Bought one when we first rescued her 7 years ago in anticipation of noise from fireworks or thunder. Turns out she didn’t need it and we could walk while the display was happening. I gave it to another dog. July 4 2019, an earthquake preceded the fireworks which scared her and she started to tremble. Fireworks have started again so I hope it helps. Thanks to other reviewers recommending go up a size. Runs small. She is 14 pounds. I bought small. Fits 15 to 25 pounds. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: hummergirl

customer_reviews.title: It worked for a Shih tzu this 4th of July
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased on how this helped my Older Pup. The last few years she’s gotten more sensitive ( very upset 😢) with firecrackers. I did follow the directions and got her use to it ahead of the 4th and we got through it ok. And now I plan on keeping it handy because out town seems to be liking fireworks more and more. Thank you.....
customer_reviews.author: JoyD

customer_reviews.title: Thunder Shirt Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to go with the original name Thunder Shirt and I’m both amazed and so happy that this really takes away my dogs anxiety. Before we got this the poor puppy would pace and cry in her kennel. We even have installed a camera in the top of her kennel. Now, with this product she’s like a sleeping puppy & she’s very relaxed. I can now enjoy going out with our her knowing she’s okay!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen B.

customer_reviews.title: This really does work!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think it worked until I put it on my little rat terrier because my other dog 'mad dogs'' him When I put it on it was like a complete turn a round. I got one for the 'Queen' of the house hold. When I put it on her, I laughed hysterically, I put it on her, and her tail started wagging and she laid down and rolled and rolled. Highly recommended esp for a nervous or anxious dog!
customer_reviews.author: pepperhorseTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I give it 4 because I KNOW this works... for other pups. Mine however, it has not and we are so incredibly disappointed. My pup has a full shakes and heavy breathing meltdown during storms and fireworks. Last night we had a pretty good thunderstorm roll in and it did nothing for her. We only just got it and have had her wear it a couple times in non-triggering situations where she appeared to be feeling pretty relaxed. But once the storm hit, the shirt was no match for her fear. On to CBD or Xanax next.
customer_reviews.author: Archaeogal

customer_reviews.title: does not work for all dogs
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs is petrified by thunder. I moved to western Texas where thunderstorms are common. My dog would get to the point of panting, running around and going crazy when he heard thunder. Many people recommended this product. Tried it twice... not an iota of difference in behavior. He still panicked. Shame it didn't work, I was hoping for my dogs sake!
customer_reviews.author: stephniels

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong. Nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: I started putting the thundershirt on my dog whenever she gets anxious. I definitely noticed her behaving more calm (e.g. not crying when I'm not in the room). But I also noticed that any clothes has this effect on her. So it's not that there's anything wrong with the thundershirt, it's just that there are more attractive shirts that do the same job.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Chen

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably calmer in stressful situations. Thunderstorm, firecrackers. It works!
customer_reviews.text: My sweet rescue girl has a lot of fears and anxiety. Not surprising with the abuse she survived the first 2 years of her life. I wanted to try a thunder shirt after seeing that if I made a doggie burrito when there were fireworks or thunder she would shake a little less. This thunder shirt is amazing. She is noticeably calmer. I highly recommend. Quality material. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: patrap777

customer_reviews.title: This shirt is magic!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe this shirt actually works!! My 70lb pit bull is terrified of thunder so I thought I’d give this a try. She would pant, drool excessively, and shake terribly to the point I thought she was going to have a seizure. Now with the shirt, it’s all stopped! It’s AMAZING!! There was nothing I could do before to calm her down or make her feel safe and it broke my heart. Don’t get me wrong, she’s still on alert and knows the thunder monster is out there, but no more shaking, drooling, or panting!!!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dorie P.

customer_reviews.title: 1 Week
customer_reviews.text: It took a total of one week of use for my dog to tear this off of her and make it unusable. She had pretty bad separation anxiety and the hope was this product would help. For my dog it was a solid failure if you buy this I hope you have better luck with it than I did.
customer_reviews.author: James Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: So, I was very hopeful this jacket would work but it did nothing. I mean nothing at all. I put it on and my guy was ok with it, but he still shook and barked in the car. I also tried the calming treats and they did nothing. I started giving thwm to him like 2 weeks b4 our trip to get them in his system. I was hopeful he would lay down in the car or at least relax. Nope.. still barked and whined. Oh well.. maybe something else will work. jacket went back
customer_reviews.author: Robink

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua like this one because this one you can put calming spray in it if anyone want to know it the deluxe one of Thunder Shirt I have tried other X smalls ones but this one fits better on my 7 lbs chihuahua I’m guessing it’s who the manufacturer it that makes difference one I would have prefer one less expensive buy thunder shirt but it’s for my chihuahua and he is the one that has to wear it I’m satisfied and do is he i happy for what I paid for
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis B.

customer_reviews.title: Does not help my dog one bit
customer_reviews.text: This did absolutely nothing for my dog! My dog is scared of storms and petrified of fireworks. I bought this to help calm her for the 4th of July weekend. I have kind and considerate neighbors who love to light the loudest possible fireworks at all hours every day of the week for an entire month (hope you picked up on the sarcasm). I put this on her and it hasn't helped or calmed her one bit. She still pants heavy, heart races, and paces around the house with every loud bang. I wasn't expecting a miracle but was hoping for some relief. Very disappointed and will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: shelma

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, fits well, prompt shipment
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has literal PTSD (I actually use that word correctly - “literally”). We *think* it helps a little and give her the courage to be able to scamper somewhere to shake in terror during a thunderstorm versus just be absolutely frozen in terror. So this is an improvement. Think she had issues when was homeless. It fits well and would fit a variety of weights/shapes. Easy to use. The idea is the same as swaddling a baby, just a tight wrap. Easy to take off too. It is worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: C. Resnikoff

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt to help dog behavioral
customer_reviews.text: Good dog behavioral shirt. It really calms my dog down from going all crazy on fourth of July and New Years eve. It really calms him down makes it tolerable and not bark at every pop outside. Highly recommend this shirt for dogs that get excited or scared for events, noises, things, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Big T

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made Product
customer_reviews.text: Product is poorly made and will fall apart easily with the slightest bit of activity from your dog. Stitching is coming off in several places (See Photos). Stitching on the top flap is one single flat stitch. This will pull apart if the vest is tight and you're meant to tighten this product. There is improvement in my dog when using the vest I'm just worried about how flimsy it is.
customer_reviews.author: Zan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used a Thunder shirt in the past for another dog. I made an incredible difference during thunder storms. We purchased this one for our newest addition who is a little larger. He seems to like the garment, but it did not work as well for him as it did our other pup. For the money it was certainly worth the try! I would still highly recommend the product due to the fact it worked so well for the dog that was inconsolable around loud noises such as thunder and fireworks.
customer_reviews.author: Action Family

customer_reviews.title: Thundershirt
customer_reviews.text: The Thundershirt has worked wonders for my dog. She was shaking terribly during storms. I don’t know why, but it took about 5-10 times of her wearing it during thunder storms before I saw improvement in her shaking. Now when it thunders, she comes running to me and stands nicely while I put the Thundershirt on her. If the thunder is in the distance she doesn’t shake at all. If it’s a close storm she still shakes, but not as badly as she did before having the Thundershirt. I’m sure it depends on the dog, but based on my experience with the Thundershirt, I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: T Blue

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this shirt. He runs to it for me to put it on him at the first crack of thunder, but once he has it on it doesn't really seem to sooth him as expected because he still sits on me when I'm in the room, scratches at the door when I'm not, and pants so hard he slobbers all over the floor. I thought this product would have a better result for him. He still wears it because I paid so much for and he does seem to like it, but I end still having to give him melatonin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rune Trevaine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, must try if your pet suffers!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr old Havanese has serious anxiety issues & absolutely looses his mind with the thunder & fireworks. I finally gave in & tried this. I can not believe it works! I wish I got this so much sooner. I didn't think it would work. Well I was completely wrong..boyfriend right. It is worth trying if you fur baby suffers. Each one will react differently of course, although I am amazed. When he starts to whine I put it on & he immediately is comforted. It's truly mind boggling. 1st picture is 1st night during fireworks hiding in the bathroom. Now he wants it & let's is know to pu it on when he is stressing. No joke!
customer_reviews.author: DC3

customer_reviews.title: If it works for a Malinois, it will work on any dog
customer_reviews.text: Temple Grandin is a genius. This works! We have a 60lb Belgian Malinois who isn't afraid of anything--Thunder, gunfire, fireworks, vacuums--he just has this needy, intense anxiety when he's not doing a job. He used to pace and chase his tail and a whole list of neurotic/anxious behaviors. We had him on drugs, but we had to keep upping the dose to get him to relax and chill out. He is currently sleeping on my feet; we had company over, and he wasn't freaking out. I'd say the sizing is off though... We had to try and shrink ours to get it to fit snugly. We may order the next size down for a backup shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Clapp

customer_reviews.title: My Dog loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended this by a friend for my dogs anxiety with thunderstorms and Fireworks. I was a bit skeptical, but what a huge difference it makes! We put it on him before any event that he normally gets upset and its like he doesnt even know it happening. A huge difference!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Helped more than other things we’ve tried...
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year old Shiba Inu is terrified of lightning and fireworks. I thought I would give this a try as we have tried everything! It’s a great fit and as soon as I put it on her she later right down. I got the chance to try it during pre-4th fireworks... at first it seemed to keep her calm, but as they got louder and closer her anxiety increased and it didn’t seem to help 😔. Initially it did help more than anything else has in the past though!
customer_reviews.author: SarahMc

customer_reviews.title: Our sensitive labrador HATES this!! Will not move with it on :(
customer_reviews.text: UGH, such a bummer! Our sweet & sensitive Labrador Biscuit will not move once the jacket is on him. He shivers and stands as still as a statue until we remove it. We followed the directions, offering treats and limited wear time in the beginning stages of getting used to it. He will keep the treat in his mouth and not eat it until we take off the jacket. He even peed on himself with such fear of wearing it. We had hoped he would have responded better to this in preparation for the forth of July and purchased weeks in advance. This product didn't work out for us-which is disappointing because most of the reviews are positive.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy
